name: Text.DateStyle
desc: A predefined style used to display a Date.

items.name: static let offset: Text.DateStyle
items.desc: A style displaying a date as offset from now.

items.name: static let relative: Text.DateStyle
items.desc: A style displaying a date as relative to now.

items.name: static let time: Text.DateStyle
items.desc: A style displaying only the time component for a date.

items.name: static let timer: Text.DateStyle
items.desc: A style displaying a date as timer counting from now.
